description:
Molecular Future describes itself as a one-stop digital asset investment service platform jointly invested by Molecular Group, CHINA FORTUNE (00110.HK), Eagle Fund, HBCC Investment, XBTING Foundation, HCASH Foundation, and Collinstar Capital. Molecular Future describes itself as a one-stop digital asset investment service platform jointly invested by Molecular Group, CHINA FORTUNE (00110.HK), Eagle Fund, HBCC Investment, XBTING Foundation, HCASH Foundation, and Collinstar Capital. Molecular Future APP provides three major products: Molecular Future APP provides three major products:
  • FundsCurrent Fund, ETF, CTA, Hedge Funds and Quantitative Funds;
  • CryptoCurrency pledge: Cryptocurrency mortgage - includes lending and borrowing;
  • Molecular fission: Daily dividends when users hold MOF, which can be used for financial management
name: Molecular Future
